I am almost 5’4 and normally I have to hem post of my pants but these overalls run short. I absolutely love them and got so many compliments but I am scared of washing them because they will shrink. They are not long enough and I am conscious over how short they are. Almost high water looking pants.
The material is stiff, but I get so many compliments. I would size up, I am 5'5" and got a size small, they are shorter than I would like them to be.
I am almost 5’7” and with my longer legs they are almost high waters. The crotch also is super low. Strange cut.

I love these, they are a roomy so you don’t have to size up! I will say that if you are tall, these might not be your jam but if you’re 5’4 and shorter it’ll be a great length for you! Overall really cute and love them.
These came with no button holes for the buttons, no buckles for the straps.
It’s comfortable and loose in the right spots. Definitely a must buy.
I like the Comfy and stylishness of this item. Good quality. Very, cute overalls! Would recommend.
The fit is very good however if you carry your weight around your belly I would size up, it’s fitted around the waist and very roomy in the hip area
These are so cute I wore them to a cheer competition and got so many compliments. If you’re in between sizes go up and they’ll be perfect.

I clicked the buy now on the wrong :-/ BUT it still worked out! I hate returning things but they are so cute and the material is thick! I’m 5’6, they come right to my ankle. I wish they were longer but o did adjust the straps, so it’s just a relaxed fit and not hiking them up. I’m 190lbs. I meant to buy the XL but i purchased the XXL. I’d buy again if they had other prints :-)
Way tooooo short. Nice fabric, fittings
Just as pictured. Love the fit. I'm 5'4" and they were a great length on me.
Very cute and comfortable.
These are so fun! I am so glad I purchased. Such a fun twist on regular bibs.
I am 5'2" 125 and bought a xsmall. It was a perfect fit. They are super comfy and fashionable. I get lots of compliments on them.
Love these!  I get multiple compliments every time I wear them.  I ordered both a medium and a large.  I could have worn either size but liked the oversized fit of the large.
Well made and absolutely adorable on!
Ordered two pairs and both were different. The hardware did not come on the overalls. I had to assemble myself.
Took over 3 weeks to get here and is missing the hooks/clasp to hook the overalls in the front. Do not order

Theyre cute in pic, but really tight in the mid section and very stiff. I will be returning them, but if you love them definitely size up.  Also they don't have pockets at the hip, just cargo pockets at the thigh

I love these!! BUT I’m 5.4ft 135lbs I got a small and they are barely long enough, I might un do the hem on the bottom so they aren’t to short. So if you are tall I would not buy these. Other than the material is great, color great and got a ton of compliments.
Buckles and straps were not sewn or put together. Seams were unfinished. Buckle holes were still sewn shut.

评论概述: Too small, took weeks to ship
评论详情: I wanted so badly for these to turn out but they were too small. I’m a size 20 typically and the XXL fit more like a 16/18. Came with the hardware attached. Other downside was they took like 2 & 1/2 weeks to ship.
Wearing a medium for a baggy fit im almost 5’6 145 lbs size 4 quality is so good they’re adorable
These are really nicely made and true to size.

I was so excited for these and wanted to love them, but unfortunately they run super short ☹️ I am 5’7 and these were ankle length on me, even with adjusting the straps down as low as I could go (without it looking ridiculous). 2 stars because they were so cute otherwise, I just wish they had different inseam options.

评论概述: Terrible Quality / Cheap Material / Runs 2 sizes big
评论详情: The hardware on these were laughable.  It was cheap flimsy sharp metal that broke while trying to install (yes, you have to install the hardware in the straps yourself) one pocket was missing all the buttons. The buttons feel like they will all fall off after one wear.  The overalls themselves are cute but they are made incredibly poor and with the cheapest possible hardware.  They run 2 sizes too big.  I expected them to be baggy but they are huge.

评论概述: Cute would recommend for the price
评论详情: I bought these after seeing similar ones on TikTok. I’m 5’2 131lbs and I bout a size small. They fit fine, around the waist they’re a little snug but not too bad, if you want a baggy-er look maybe order a medium. The hardware does not come attached but honestly not a big deal at all. I would recommend them for sure!
Jean like material. Cute pattern. I sized up because i like my overalls baggy. Would buy again.

Saw these leopard overalls on Instagram and headed with over to Amazon immediately. Found them, of course. When they arrived, I noticed they have big cargo pockets on the side of the thigh - which I didn't like. So I removed them carefully using a seam ripper. Threw them in the wash and there wasn't a trace of the cargo pocket. Only problem is - now there are no side pockets, lol. The straps are cool, they're remind me of seat belt material. Very on trend for fall 2024, I'm excited to wear them.
They are awesome quality; i am usually a large and bought a large, they fit loose enough which is the fit I’m going for.
I’ve gotten so many complementary and they are soo cumfy!!

There was pros and cons from this overallI like the leopard print pattern.  I also like how it's thick but not too thick or stiff.  The length for me is perfect. I bought an xs, I'm 411 and about 120 ibs.  The price is decent.Okay, let's talk about the straps and buckles.  The straps are like off of a backpack.  It's the vibe I'm getting from it, not the greatest.  Also, the buckles came in a small bag, not attached to the overalls.  You definitely need to add the buckles yourself.  The quality of the hardwares and buckles are very low.  I feel like it'll break or fall apart.  Just flimsy.I was reaching for the straps and broke the stitching on the strap.  Wasn't too thrilled when that happened.I wanted to also mentioned, there was lose treads.  And the stitching was off.  It's not bothersome because it's either hidden or less noticeable. The was treads I had to trim off.Its not a bad overall if you want to look pass all the flaws.
these are sick. definitely feel like forever 21 quality denim and the buckles are cheap af but for the price theyre epic 😎
Comfy and cute to wear

The actual material and fit of these overalls are great, but when trying to adjust the straps I filleted my finger open slipping on the metal hardware on the straps. They’re SUPER sharp (they’re a cheaper metal) and I dunno, I feel like I would have happily paid $10-15 more for these overalls if my hands didn’t get literally sliced open from handling them improperly.

Super cute and comfortable (as most overalls are). I had to add the clasps myself when I got them but it was simple enough with a YouTube video. Some of the stitching on the big pocket started to come undone but it was super easy to fix!! These are a statement and so cute. I am 4”10, 107 lbs and bought a small
Great quality,  fit perfectly

Awful quality. Comes with hardware separate you have to assemble yourself and you will need a sewing machine to complete so be warned! Unfinished seams everywhere and cut threads where they should have been secure, with wear it’s likely pockets and seams will come undone. One of my straps wasn’t even fully attached.
Fit so well!! Good thick fabric, don’t feel cheap at all. They are more fitted around the waist, so you don’t look bulky, but they are still cute and slouchy. Definitely recommend.

Purchased these in a size small. Was shocked at the quality! They were made really well and I didn't have to put the buckle on the straps. They were a tish too baggy for me, so I decided to return and purchase the xsmall. This order took like 2 extra weeks to come and once I got them, they were way thinner material, lighter print, the buckles were not on so I guess I will have to do those myself, but to top it off, all the holes for the metal buttons are still closed, so I cannot button it up on the sides or on the pockets. Very disappointed and wished I just kept the size small. Now if I want to order, I have to pay the import fee and I guess hope I get the same level quality that I got with the first pair. Be aware!
Good quality  love these true to size
absolutley fab! true to size! I am a size 10 and j ordered a small !
